original_text: On the eighth day they came to circumcise the child, and they were going to name him after his father Zechariah,
korean_text: 팔 일이 되매 아이를 할례하러 와서 그 아버지의 이름을 따라 사가랴라 하고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: On the eighth day they came to circumcise the child,
and they were going to name him after his father Zechariah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 스가랴의 이름을 따라 그의 이름을 짓고자 하였으니,
